entry.title: BLOWING SNOW ADVISORY, Dempster (Highway)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:57 p.m. MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow and blowing snow. Low minus 13.
entry.summary: Snow and blowing snow. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h except 70 near the Richardson mountains. Low minus 13. Wind chill minus 18 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Light snow and blowing snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Light snow ending late in the afternoon then cloudy. Blowing snow. Wind northeast 30 km/h except 70 near the Richardson mountains in the morning and early in the afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill near minus 23. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy in the evening. Blowing snow early in the evening. Wind east 30 km/h except 60 near the Richardson mountains early in the evening. Wind becoming light in the evening. Low minus 14. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 12. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 7.

entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy periods with 30 percent chance of flurries. Low minus 11. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 6.
entry.summary: Local blowing snow. Windy. High minus 6. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Monday 17 April 2023
